alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk Valley; Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys; Middle Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 03 at 2:45PM AKST until January 04 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk Valley, Middle Yukon Valley and Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will remain strong into Thursday morning. Blowing and drifting snow will cause snow drifts to form.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk Valley; Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys; Middle Yukon Valley
